title:
[Placements]
FTE+Intern or Just FTE?
content: Accenture, Infosys came for recruitment but they not mentioned its FTE+intern or its just FTE , can any one who knows confirm this

comments.body:
iirc, for our batch -

Infosys came for FTE only   
Accenture as well for FTE only
Like how to know if its fte only, do we need to contact placement office?
yes, if u really want to confirm
